items.sentence: Tom and Mary pretended to be husband and wife.
Tom and Mary ran off to Boston to get married.
Tom and Mary sailed around the world together.
Tom and Mary seem to be suited for each other.
Tom and Mary started talking at the same time.
We invited our new neighbors over for a drink.
We must try to conserve our natural resources.
Tom didn\'t want me to go to Boston with Mary.
Tom didn\'t want to ask anyone for directions.
One of us will have to ask Tom what he thinks.
